name: Facebook Chat un-bubbler
description: Fixes the new Facebook chat "bubbles" that look like the old mobile app. Un-rounds the corners and gets rid of gradients and shadows.
additional_info:
I know this may be cursing it, but it's almost been a year now with no updates to this script and it still works fine! Woohoo!

NEW - Version 1.6 - Facebook has changed lots of element names and broken some parts of this. There's currently no way to change the background-color of chat boxes without also changing the colour of the timeline post time stamps.

Version 1.5 - Yet another fix for Facebook changing the names of divs. My life has become an eternal struggle of updating this every few days.

Version 1.4 - Brightens that horrible new dark grey background on the new Timeline by a bit. Personal touch. If you don't like it, just go into Stylish and remove the "._5vb_, ._5vb_ #contentCol {" section.

Version 1.3 - Pretty sure Facebook is out to get me at this point, some additional div name changes and more !important tags.

Version 1.2 - Facebook broke something, I added !important to things now it works again!

Version 1.1 - Facebook removed ".bubbles" div class, which broke the script. Fixed by removing on un-bubbler too.

Version 1.0 - un-bubbles chat, gets rid of box shadow and text shadow, gets rid of gradients.

Contact me @falolout for feedback!
